setting.value:
We're super excited for the [B][COLOR white]Rio 2016 Summer Olympics[/COLOR][/B] to begin! You might not yet realize, but Kodi is actually the best way to enjoy all that the Olympics have to offer, giving you access to all international games.
We've put together a guide detailing the best addons for streaming the Summer Olympics, and are also giving away an NVIDIA SHIELD TV box!
Visit our Blog for Everything Olympics and Kodi: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/kodi-reviews/[/COLOR][/B]
Don't forget to take part in the contest for your chance to win!
